text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: I'll win 'em all!!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I'll do it my way!
In everything!

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text: I'll give it my all without neglecting my health.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmmmuuuuuu...!
(Crash!)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Bweeeeee!?
The bell fell!
This year too, I spent a lively New Year's with Matikanetannhauser and her friends.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Sniff, sniff sniff...
Hmm, I think it's okay!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Still, that was a shock~
I wonder if my wish got through properly?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Machitan, what did you wish for?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, since I'm finally in the senior class this year, I wished to do even better!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Especially this year, there are so many amazing girls. If you space out, you'll get tripped up left and right.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
McQueen-san, aiming for her third consecutive Tenno Sho (Spring) win.
Palmer-san, who's been making waves in various G1 races.

text_block_list.name: Ikuno Dictus
text_block_list.text:
And Flower-san is also one to watch.
Her performance in the sprint division has been splendid.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The girls said to be coming out on the classic front this year are supposed to be amazing too.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hayahide-san, Ticket-san, Taishin-san.
Ahh, I'm looking forward to it~.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: 'Looking forward to it,' huh. Same as always.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Speaking of which, Tannhauser, do you have any goals or something like that for this year?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Other than winning everything!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh?
Well, umm, let's see...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I do, but it's embarrassing, so it's a secret.

And that evening.
I was called to stop as we were parting ways.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Trainer, trainer!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Um, there's something I want to tell only you, trainer.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Well, it's about my goal.
...This year, I want to try finding myself.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Yes!
What the chairman said at the summer training camp—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
The words 'because it's you,'
I still don't really get them.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Because it's me... what?
It's making me feel all fuzzy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Probably, I don't really
understand myself well, huh.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I want to live up to the chairman's expectations,
and to do that, I think I have to understand!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
So, yeah!
This year, I'll do 'finding myself' too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Alright, so let's do our best!
For the first thing of the new year, what should we do?
As for training fitting for today—
choice_data_list: Since it's a special occasion, the full course!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh—!?
On the first day!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So that means, starting tomorrow, we'll go all out...!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I see, so you're fully motivated...!
Then today, I'll conserve stamina without holding back!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright... I'm going to sleep!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Zzz... zzz...

And so, the first training of the new year
began peacefully.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Full course! That means, going back and forth between the grounds,
the indoor gym, and the pool...!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Looks fun!
Which one should we do first? I can't decide!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
I know, let's make a lottery draw!
It's our first test of luck for the new year!
And so, the first training session of the new year began peacefully.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Whoa...!
Enemy reconnaissance!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So that means, grab a tree branch and head to the grounds, right!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Oh yeah, while we're at it,
should we dress up as ninjas too?
And so, the first training session of the new year began peacefully.

The senior class is full of tough opponents.
I want to give it my all and race through it!
